mapper.select: SELECT g.gid, g.codeno, g.uid, u.uname, m.mname, co.coloption, w.woption, i.ioption, m.mprice+co.colprice+w.wprice+i.iprice as price, ca.corder FROM garage g INNER JOIN carbuild ca ON ca.codeno = g.codeno INNER JOIN users u ON u.uid = g.uid INNER JOIN model m ON m.mid = ca.mid INNER JOIN color co ON co.colid = ca.colid INNER JOIN wheel w ON w.wid = ca.wid INNER JOIN interior i ON i.iid = ca.iid WHERE ca.corder = 0 AND g.gid = ${gid};

SELECT g.gid, g.codeno, g.uid, u.uname, m.mname, co.coloption, w.woption, i.ioption, m.mprice+co.colprice+w.wprice+i.iprice as price, ca.corder FROM garage g INNER JOIN carbuild ca ON ca.codeno = g.codeno INNER JOIN users u ON u.uid = g.uid INNER JOIN model m ON m.mid = ca.mid INNER JOIN color co ON co.colid = ca.colid INNER JOIN wheel w ON w.wid = ca.wid INNER JOIN interior i ON i.iid = ca.iid WHERE ca.corder = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE GARAGE SET CODENO=#{codeno},UID=#{uid} WHERE GID=#{gid}
